page.title: 19Trade
page.content: The New Inn,a public house and restaurant,selling a wide selection of beers,wines & spirits.The restaurant seats 40 people,is open for evening meals five evenings per week and bar lunches daily. The village shop is a small annexe to a house run by a husband and wife the shop is also a sub post office.General foodstuffs are on sale,mostly non perishable's, but bread is available on Mondays & Thursdays.Locally produced eggs are sold.Newspapers and magazines are supplied to order.The shop also acts as agent for a firm of dry cleaners. The butcher retails meat from his slaugterhouse but most of his sales are from vans covering the area in addition to fresh meat he sells cooked meat,meat pies and poultery.Vans call in the village weekly selling cont.
